info.name: Paranoid Gram
info.description:
A customizable dark Instagram theme with a few animations and effects.
Right click is enabled in posts and stories.
You can change every colour inside the theme.

I believe Instagram blocks links to other sites and so images on Imgur won't work well.
to use a background you must send the picture to any contact on Instagram (or you can use a post too) and copy the link to the direct image. then open the theme and replace "https:null" with that link in: 

background: url("https:null") no-repeat center center fixed;

Sorry if it's too complicated, only way I found it could work.
